subject: Football
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: By prioritizing so-called league interests when initially punishing Ray Rice for a domestic abuse charge, N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell blundered badly and ended up harming the league and its owners.
snippet: By prioritizing so-called league interests when initially punishing Ray Rice for a domestic abuse charge, N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell blundered badly and ended up harming the league and its owners.
